sentences.sContent: The smallest marsupial in all the world is but 45mm in length. So small that when fully grown it can stand comfortable in a dessert spoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: The smallest marsupial in all the world is but 45mm in length. So small that when fully grown it can stand comfortable in a dessert spoon.
sentences.sCn: 全世界最小的有袋动物只不过45毫米，小到待其完全长大时还能够舒舒服服地站到一只点心匙上。

sentences.sContent: A long-tailed marsupial mouse, is found only in the Kimberley region of Western Australia. This timid creature rarely ventures for from its nest.
sentences.sContent_eng: A long-tailed marsupial mouse, is found only in the Kimberley region of Western Australia. This timid creature rarely ventures for from its nest.
sentences.sCn: 一种长尾有袋鼠，只有在西澳洲的金伯利来地区才能见到。这种胆小的动物几乎从不远离自己的巢穴外出冒险。

sentences.sContent: Wallabies are marsupial mammals like kangaroos and eat diets high in vegetation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wallabies are marsupial mammals like kangaroos and eat diets high in vegetation.
sentences.sCn: 小袋鼠是像袋鼠一样有袋的哺乳类动物并食用含有大量制备的食物。

trans.tranOther: an animal such as a  kangaroo  which carries its babies in a pocket of skin on its body
